4317040.name: Alone After Dark: Head Practitioner
4317040.description:
Head Practitioner is the first installment in the episodic horror series Alone After Dark. Your responsibility will be to attend to the patients of Coldrock Medical Center, an eerie hospital where things don't quite seem right.

Gameplay

Head Practitioner is a first-person, horror narrative game set in a hospital where you are responsible for 4 rooms during your first night shift. You will distribute medications, perform maintenance, manage patient charts, and juggle their requests while trying to piece together the unnerving implications of the troubling medical record for the missing patient in Room 4.

Key Features

  • Retro VHS aesthetic

  • Unsettling atmosphere

  • Disturbing dialogue

  • Nightmarish narrative

  • Multiple endings

  • Harrowing realizations

  • Medical minigames

  • Hidden clues and easter eggs

  • Steam achievements
4317040.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
